column4: I'm a bit worried about my desktop.  Yesterday, while my computer was outside of my routers firewall, I recieved a request for a VNC session, and I denied it.  Today, linux is running slowly, and crashing quite frequently.  What can I do?
first, see what software you have running. use "sudo top"
look for the ones using most cpu
look their process number, then look around in /proc/<number>
